metadata.dc:author: Martín Sanz, L
Alonso Bañuelos, C
Soleto Martín, J
metadata.dc:description: Three cases of congenital superior ankyloglossia, two central and one lateral, are presented. All children had also other malformations. The embryology, etiology and syndromes including ankyloglossia are analysed and the authors review the world literature during de five last years founding only a few similar cases.
metadata.dc:title: Anquiloglosia superior.
[Superior ankyloglossia].
